ingredients.ingredient: ½ pound pork tenderloin, cut into thin strips
½ pound prawns, peeled and deveined
1 bunch fresh cilantro, leaves picked from stems
¼ head romaine lettuce, cut into bite-size pieces

gear.name: Shallow Dish
gear.searchTerm: shallow dish for rice wrapper soaking

cookingTips: Cook pork tenderloin quickly over high heat to keep it tender, then slice thinly against the grain
Soak rice wrappers in warm water for 10-15 seconds until pliable but not sticky
Arrange ingredients in a line on the wrapper before rolling tightly to prevent tearing
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user master Vietnamese spring rolls by cooking proteins until just tender, softening rice wrappers correctly, and assembling rolls with a careful technique to prevent tearing and ensure balanced flavors.
